snippet.title: Wave War One - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Battle your way through the trenches of World War I, pushing back enemies and advancing your position on the battlefield. Deploy and command 8 distinct unit types to fight your way through engaging single player campaign, full of heroic battles - the fate of your people and the whole war is in your hands!
------------------------------------------------------------

More about the game: 
//link//
